key_talking_points: The Florida Panthers are maintaining a slight lead over the Edmonton Oilers, with the score at 5-4 early in the first period.
Sam Reinhart (FLA) is actively generating scoring chances, registering a shot on goal a few moments ago.
Physical play is starting to pick up, with Leon Draisaitl (EDM) delivering a hit on Carter Verhaeghe (FLA) deep in the corner.
for_commentary_agent.context: The game is relatively active with a few shots and hits, but the momentum is not extremely high. A close score early in the 1st period warrants mixed coverage to provide context and analysis alongside play-by-play.
